desc: My store dedicated to growing vibes through my grief and transmuting that grief into beautiful things!! I make suncatchers, car charms, bracelets, and many other handmade crafts in memory of my toddler son. I also sell sell many crystals as well as plants! Hastings, Nebraska - Michelle Tatro Heeren

layout.text:
I created #GrowingMagicVibes because I had just lost my toddler and had so much grief I didn’t know what to do, so I transmuted my grief in handmade items, plants and now hand picking crystals to sell!
Use code: FreeShip to get free shipping on all orders over $150 🌟
Check out my Coupon Code Page for savings 💴
Anything you see can be picked up in Hastings, Nebraska : growingmagicvibes is my instagram
Michelle Tatro-Heeren (owner)
